message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DS, cs.SI

The paper deals with the explore/exploit dilemma in recommender systems, which is a common problem in machine learning. The proposed algorithm is a contextual bandit algorithm, which is a type of reinforcement learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also deals with dynamic environments and changing user preferences, which are relevant to sub-categories such as cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The use of recommender systems suggests relevance to cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper involves rigorous analysis of the algorithm's performance, which is relevant to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms).
